trans-unit.source: The following example displays a positive and a negative value using each of the supported standard numeric format specifiers for three different cultures.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例显示正值和负值的每个支持标准数字格式说明符用于三种不同的区域性。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="format" /> is invalid or not supported.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="format" /> 无效或不受支持。

trans-unit.source: Converts the string representation of a number to its 32-bit signed integer equivalent.
trans-unit.target: 将数字的字符串表示形式转换为它的等效 32 位有符号整数。

trans-unit.source: A return value indicates whether the operation succeeded.
trans-unit.target: 一个指示操作是否成功的返回值。

trans-unit.source: A string containing a number to convert.
trans-unit.target: 包含要转换的数字的字符串。

trans-unit.source: When this method returns, contains the 32-bit signed integer value equivalent of the number contained in <c>s</c>, if the conversion succeeded, or zero if the conversion failed.
trans-unit.target: 当此方法返回时，如果转换成功，则包含与 <c>s</c> 中所包含的数字等效的 32 位无符号整数值；如果转换失败，则包含零。

trans-unit.source: The conversion fails if the <c>s</c> parameter is <see langword="null" /> or <see cref="F:System.String.Empty" />, is not of the correct format, or represents a number less than <see cref="F:System.Int32.MinValue" /> or greater than <see cref="F:System.Int32.MaxValue" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <c>s</c> 参数为 <see langword="null" /> 或为 <see cref="F:System.String.Empty" />、格式不正确，或者表示小于 <see cref="F:System.Int32.MinValue" /> 或大于 <see cref="F:System.Int32.MaxValue" /> 的数，则转换失败。

trans-unit.source: This parameter is passed uninitialized; any value originally supplied in <c>result</c> will be overwritten.
trans-unit.target: 此参数未经初始化即进行传递；最初在 <c>result</c> 中提供的任何值都会被覆盖。

trans-unit.source: Converts the string representation of a number to its 32-bit signed integer equivalent.
trans-unit.target: 将数字的字符串表示形式转换为它的等效 32 位有符号整数。

trans-unit.source: A return value indicates whether the conversion succeeded.
trans-unit.target: 一个指示转换是否成功的返回值。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if <paramref name="s" /> was converted successfully; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see langword="true" /> 成功转换，则为 <paramref name="s" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Int32.TryParse%2A> method is like the <xref:System.Int32.Parse%2A> method, except the <xref:System.Int32.TryParse%2A> method does not throw an exception if the conversion fails.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Int32.TryParse%2A>方法就像是<xref:System.Int32.Parse%2A>方法，除了<xref:System.Int32.TryParse%2A>方法不会引发异常，如果转换失败。

trans-unit.source: It eliminates the need to use exception handling to test for a <xref:System.FormatException> in the event that `s` is invalid and cannot be successfully parsed.
trans-unit.target: 不必使用异常处理来测试是否<xref:System.FormatException>的事件中`s`无效，无法成功分析。

trans-unit.source: The `s` parameter contains a number of the form:
trans-unit.target: `s`参数包含一个数字的窗体：

trans-unit.source: [ws][sign]digits[ws]
trans-unit.target: [ws][sign]digits[ws]

trans-unit.source: Items in square brackets ([ and ]) are optional.
trans-unit.target: 方括号 （[和]） 中是可选的项。

trans-unit.source: The following table describes each element.
trans-unit.target: 下表描述每个元素。

trans-unit.source: Element
trans-unit.target: 元素

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: 描述

trans-unit.source: *ws*
trans-unit.target: *ws*

trans-unit.source: Optional white space.
trans-unit.target: 可选的空白区域。

trans-unit.source: *sign*
trans-unit.target: *sign*

trans-unit.source: An optional sign.
trans-unit.target: 一个可选符号后。

trans-unit.source: *digits*
trans-unit.target: *digits*

trans-unit.source: A sequence of digits ranging from 0 to 9.
trans-unit.target: 范围从 0 到 9 的数字的序列。

trans-unit.source: The `s` parameter is interpreted using the <xref:System.Globalization.NumberStyles.Integer?displayProperty=nameWithType> style.
trans-unit.target: `s`参数被解释使用<xref:System.Globalization.NumberStyles.Integer?displayProperty=nameWithType>样式。

trans-unit.source: In addition to the decimal digits, only leading and trailing spaces together with a leading sign are allowed.
trans-unit.target: 十进制数字，除了允许仅前导空格和尾随空格以及前导符号。

trans-unit.source: To explicitly define the style elements together with the culture-specific formatting information that can be present in `s`, use the <xref:System.Int32.TryParse%28System.String%2CSystem.Globalization.NumberStyles%2CSystem.IFormatProvider%2CSystem.Int32%40%29?displayProperty=nameWithType> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要显式定义的样式元素以及可出现在区域性特定格式设置信息`s`，使用<xref:System.Int32.TryParse%28System.String%2CSystem.Globalization.NumberStyles%2CSystem.IFormatProvider%2CSystem.Int32%40%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法。

trans-unit.source: The `s` parameter is parsed using the formatting information in a <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo> object initialized for the current system culture.
trans-unit.target: `s`使用中的格式设置信息分析参数<xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo>初始化针对当前系统区域性的对象。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo.CurrentInfo%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 有关详情，请参阅<xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo.CurrentInfo%2A>。

trans-unit.source: This overload of the <xref:System.Int32.TryParse%2A> method interprets all digits in the `s` parameter as decimal digits.
trans-unit.target: 此重载<xref:System.Int32.TryParse%2A>方法将解释中的所有位`s`为十进制数字的参数。

trans-unit.source: To parse the string representation of a hexadecimal number, call the <xref:System.Int32.TryParse%28System.String%2CSystem.Globalization.NumberStyles%2CSystem.IFormatProvider%2CSystem.Int32%40%29?displayProperty=nameWithType> overload.
trans-unit.target: 若要分析的字符串表示形式的十六进制数，请调用<xref:System.Int32.TryParse%28System.String%2CSystem.Globalization.NumberStyles%2CSystem.IFormatProvider%2CSystem.Int32%40%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>重载。

trans-unit.source: The following example calls the <xref:System.Int32.TryParse%28System.String%2CSystem.Int32%40%29?displayProperty=nameWithType> method with a number of different string values.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例调用<xref:System.Int32.TryParse%28System.String%2CSystem.Int32%40%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>与大量的不同字符串值的方法。

trans-unit.source: Some of the strings that the <xref:System.Int32.TryParse%28System.String%2CSystem.Int32%40%29> method is unable to convert in this example are:
trans-unit.target: 一些字符串，<xref:System.Int32.TryParse%28System.String%2CSystem.Int32%40%29>方法不能进行转换在此示例是：

trans-unit.source: The conversion fails because the string cannot contain a decimal separator; it must contain integral digits only.
trans-unit.target: 转换失败，因为字符串不能包含小数分隔符;它必须包含仅为整型数字。

trans-unit.source: The conversion fails because the string cannot contain group separators; it must contain integral digits only.
trans-unit.target: 转换失败，因为字符串不能包含组分隔符，则为它必须包含仅为整型数字。

trans-unit.source: The conversion fails because the string cannot contain a negative sign other than the one defined by the current culture's <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo.NegativeSign%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> and <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo.NumberNegativePattern%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> properties.
trans-unit.target: 转换失败，因为字符串不能包含而不是定义由当前区域性的负号<xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo.NegativeSign%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>和<xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo.NumberNegativePattern%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>属性。

trans-unit.source: The conversion fails because the string cannot contain hexadecimal digits; it must contain decimal digits only.
trans-unit.target: 转换失败，因为字符串不能包含十六进制数字;它必须包含仅为十进制数字。

trans-unit.source: A string containing a number to convert.
trans-unit.target: 包含要转换的数字的字符串。

trans-unit.source: The string is interpreted using the style specified by <c>style</c>.
trans-unit.target: 该字符串使用由 <c>style</c> 指定的样式来进行解释。

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of enumeration values that indicates the style elements that can be present in <c>s</c>.
trans-unit.target: 枚举值的按位组合，用于指示可出现在 <c>s</c> 中的样式元素。

trans-unit.source: A typical value to specify is <see cref="F:System.Globalization.NumberStyles.Integer" />.
trans-unit.target: 要指定的一个典型值为 <see cref="F:System.Globalization.NumberStyles.Integer" />。

trans-unit.source: An object that supplies culture-specific formatting information about <c>s</c>.
trans-unit.target: 一个对象，提供有关 <c>s</c> 的区域性特定格式设置信息。

trans-unit.source: When this method returns, contains the 32-bit signed integer value equivalent of the number contained in <c>s</c>, if the conversion succeeded, or zero if the conversion failed.
trans-unit.target: 当此方法返回时，如果转换成功，则包含与 <c>s</c> 中所包含的数字等效的 32 位无符号整数值；如果转换失败，则包含零。

trans-unit.source: The conversion fails if the <c>s</c> parameter is <see langword="null" /> or <see cref="F:System.String.Empty" />, is not in a format compliant with <c>style</c>, or represents a number less than <see cref="F:System.Int32.MinValue" /> or greater than <see cref="F:System.Int32.MaxValue" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <c>s</c> 参数为 <see langword="null" /> 或为 <see cref="F:System.String.Empty" />、格式不符合 <c>style</c>，或表示的数小于 <see cref="F:System.Int32.MinValue" /> 或大于 <see cref="F:System.Int32.MaxValue" />，则转换失败。

trans-unit.source: This parameter is passed uninitialized; any value originally supplied in <c>result</c> will be overwritten.
trans-unit.target: 此参数未经初始化即进行传递；最初在 <c>result</c> 中提供的任何值都会被覆盖。

trans-unit.source: Converts the string representation of a number in a specified style and culture-specific format to its 32-bit signed integer equivalent.
trans-unit.target: 将指定样式和区域性特定格式的数字的字符串表示形式转换为它的等效 32 位有符号整数。

trans-unit.source: A return value indicates whether the conversion succeeded.
trans-unit.target: 一个指示转换是否成功的返回值。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if <paramref name="s" /> was converted successfully; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see langword="true" /> 成功转换，则为 <paramref name="s" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Int32.TryParse%2A> method is like the <xref:System.Int32.Parse%2A> method, except the <xref:System.Int32.TryParse%2A> method does not throw an exception if the conversion fails.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Int32.TryParse%2A>方法就像是<xref:System.Int32.Parse%2A>方法，除了<xref:System.Int32.TryParse%2A>方法不会引发异常，如果转换失败。

trans-unit.source: It eliminates the need to use exception handling to test for a <xref:System.FormatException> in the event that `s` is invalid and cannot be parsed successfully.
trans-unit.target: 不必使用异常处理来测试是否<xref:System.FormatException>的事件中`s`无效，无法成功分析。

trans-unit.source: The `style` parameter defines the style elements (such as white space or a positive or negative sign) that are allowed in the `s` parameter for the parse operation to succeed.
trans-unit.target: `style`参数定义中允许的样式元素 （如空白或正整数或负号）`s`分析操作成功的参数。

trans-unit.source: It must be a combination of bit flags from the <xref:System.Globalization.NumberStyles> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: 它必须是中的位标志的组合<xref:System.Globalization.NumberStyles>枚举。

trans-unit.source: Depending on the value of `style`, the `s` parameter may include the following elements:
trans-unit.target: 根据值`style`、`s`参数可能包括以下元素：

trans-unit.source: [ws][$][sign][digits,]digits[.fractional_digits][e[sign]digits][ws]
trans-unit.target: [ws][$][sign][digits,]digits[.fractional_digits][e[sign]digits][ws]

trans-unit.source: Or, if the `style` parameter includes <xref:System.Globalization.NumberStyles.AllowHexSpecifier>:
trans-unit.target: 或者，如果`style`参数包含<xref:System.Globalization.NumberStyles.AllowHexSpecifier>:

trans-unit.source: [ws]hexdigits[ws]
trans-unit.target: [ws]hexdigits[ws]

trans-unit.source: Items in square brackets ([ and ]) are optional.
trans-unit.target: 方括号 （[和]） 中是可选的项。

trans-unit.source: The following table describes each element.
trans-unit.target: 下表描述每个元素。

trans-unit.source: Element
trans-unit.target: 元素

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: 描述

trans-unit.source: *ws*
trans-unit.target: *ws*

trans-unit.source: Optional white space.
trans-unit.target: 可选的空白区域。

trans-unit.source: White space can appear at the beginning of `s` if `style` includes the <xref:System.Globalization.NumberStyles.AllowLeadingWhite?displayProperty=nameWithType> flag, or at the end of `s` if `style` includes the <xref:System.Globalization.NumberStyles.AllowTrailingWhite?displayProperty=nameWithType> flag.
trans-unit.target: 空格可以出现的开始处`s`如果`style`包括<xref:System.Globalization.NumberStyles.AllowLeadingWhite?displayProperty=nameWithType>标志，或在末尾`s`如果`style`包括<xref:System.Globalization.NumberStyles.AllowTrailingWhite?displayProperty=nameWithType>标志。

trans-unit.source: A culture-specific currency symbol.
trans-unit.target: 特定于区域性的货币符号。

trans-unit.source: Its position in the string is defined by the <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo.CurrencyPositivePattern%2A> property of the <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo> object returned by the <xref:System.IFormatProvider.GetFormat%2A> method of the `provider` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 在字符串中的位置由<xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo.CurrencyPositivePattern%2A>属性<xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo>返回对象<xref:System.IFormatProvider.GetFormat%2A>方法`provider`参数。

trans-unit.source: The currency symbol can appear in `s` if `style` includes the <xref:System.Globalization.NumberStyles.AllowCurrencySymbol?displayProperty=nameWithType> flag.
trans-unit.target: 货币符号可以出现在`s`如果`style`包括<xref:System.Globalization.NumberStyles.AllowCurrencySymbol?displayProperty=nameWithType>标志。

trans-unit.source: *sign*
trans-unit.target: *sign*

trans-unit.source: An optional sign.
trans-unit.target: 一个可选符号后。

trans-unit.source: A sign symbol can appear in `s` if `style` includes the <xref:System.Globalization.NumberStyles.AllowLeadingSign?displayProperty=nameWithType> or <xref:System.Globalization.NumberStyles.AllowTrailingSign?displayProperty=nameWithType> flags.
trans-unit.target: 正负符号可以出现在`s`如果`style`包括<xref:System.Globalization.NumberStyles.AllowLeadingSign?displayProperty=nameWithType>或<xref:System.Globalization.NumberStyles.AllowTrailingSign?displayProperty=nameWithType>标志。

trans-unit.source: *digits*
trans-unit.target: *digits*

trans-unit.source: A sequence of digits from 0 through 9.
trans-unit.target: 一系列从 0 到 9 的数字。

trans-unit.source: A culture-specific thousands separator.
trans-unit.target: 特定于区域性的千位分隔符。

trans-unit.source: The thousands separator of the culture specified by `provider` can appear in `s` if `style` includes the <xref:System.Globalization.NumberStyles.AllowThousands?displayProperty=nameWithType> flag.
trans-unit.target: 千位分隔符的指定的区域性`provider`可以出现在`s`如果`style`包括<xref:System.Globalization.NumberStyles.AllowThousands?displayProperty=nameWithType>标志。

trans-unit.source: A culture-specific decimal point symbol.
trans-unit.target: 特定于区域性的小数点符号。

trans-unit.source: The decimal point symbol of the culture specified by `provider` can appear in `s` if `style` includes the <xref:System.Globalization.NumberStyles.AllowDecimalPoint?displayProperty=nameWithType> flag.
trans-unit.target: 指定的区域性的小数点符号`provider`可以出现在`s`如果`style`包括<xref:System.Globalization.NumberStyles.AllowDecimalPoint?displayProperty=nameWithType>标志。

trans-unit.source: *fractional_digits*
trans-unit.target: *fractional_digits*

trans-unit.source: One or more occurrences of the digit 0.
trans-unit.target: 数字 0 的一个或多个匹配项。

trans-unit.source: Fractional digits can appear in `s` only if `style` includes the <xref:System.Globalization.NumberStyles.AllowDecimalPoint?displayProperty=nameWithType> flag.
trans-unit.target: 小数位数可以出现在`s`才`style`包括<xref:System.Globalization.NumberStyles.AllowDecimalPoint?displayProperty=nameWithType>标志。

trans-unit.source: The 'e' or 'E' character, which indicates that the value is represented in exponential notation.
trans-unit.target: E 或者 E 字符，它指示的值用在指数记数法表示。

trans-unit.source: The `s` parameter can represent a number in exponential notation if `style` includes the <xref:System.Globalization.NumberStyles.AllowExponent?displayProperty=nameWithType> flag.
trans-unit.target: `s`参数可以表示指数记数法的数字，如果`style`包括<xref:System.Globalization.NumberStyles.AllowExponent?displayProperty=nameWithType>标志。

trans-unit.source: *hexdigits*
trans-unit.target: *hexdigits*

trans-unit.source: A sequence of hexadecimal digits from 0 through f, or 0 through F.
trans-unit.target: 一系列从 0 到 f 或从 0 到 F.的十六进制数字

trans-unit.source: A string with decimal digits only (which corresponds to the <xref:System.Globalization.NumberStyles.None?displayProperty=nameWithType> flag) always parses successfully.
trans-unit.target: 仅为十进制数字的字符串 (它对应于<xref:System.Globalization.NumberStyles.None?displayProperty=nameWithType>标志) 总是可以分析成功。

trans-unit.source: Most of the remaining <xref:System.Globalization.NumberStyles> members control elements that may be but are not required to be present in this input string.
trans-unit.target: 其余的大多数<xref:System.Globalization.NumberStyles>成员控件可能但不是要求必须包含在此输入字符串中的元素。

trans-unit.source: The following table indicates how individual <xref:System.Globalization.NumberStyles> members affect the elements that may be present in `s`.
trans-unit.target: 下表指示个别<xref:System.Globalization.NumberStyles>成员影响中可能存在的元素`s`。

trans-unit.source: Non-composite NumberStyles values
trans-unit.target: 非复合 NumberStyles 值

trans-unit.source: Elements permitted in s in addition to digits
trans-unit.target: 除数字之外的 s 中允许的元素

trans-unit.source: Decimal digits only.
trans-unit.target: 仅为十进制数字。

trans-unit.source: The decimal point (*.*) and *fractional_digits* elements.
trans-unit.target: 小数点 (*。*) 和*fractional_digits*元素。

trans-unit.source: However, *fractional_digits* must consist of only one or more 0 digits or the method returns `false`.
trans-unit.target: 但是， *fractional_digits*仅一个或多个数字 0 或该方法将返回必须组成`false`。

trans-unit.source: The `s` parameter can also use exponential notation.
trans-unit.target: `s`参数还可以使用指数记数法。

trans-unit.source: If `s` represents a number in exponential notation, it must represent an integer within the range of the <xref:System.Int32> data type without a non-zero, fractional component.
trans-unit.target: 如果`s`表示一个数字指数记数法时，它必须表示的范围内的整数<xref:System.Int32>不带非零小数部分的数据类型。

trans-unit.source: The *ws* element at the beginning of `s`.
trans-unit.target: *Ws*开头的元素`s`。

trans-unit.source: The *ws* element at the end of `s`.
trans-unit.target: *Ws*结尾的元素`s`。

trans-unit.source: A sign can appear before *digits*.
trans-unit.target: 登录之前可以出现*数字*。

trans-unit.source: A sign can appear after *digits*.
trans-unit.target: 包含符号可以出现后*数字*。

trans-unit.source: The *sign* element in the form of parentheses enclosing the numeric value.
trans-unit.target: *登录*在括号内包含的数字值的窗体中的元素。

trans-unit.source: The thousands separator (*,*) element.
trans-unit.target: 千位分隔符 (*，*) 元素。

trans-unit.source: The *$* element.
All elements.
trans-unit.target: 所有元素。

trans-unit.source: The `s` parameter cannot represent a hexadecimal number or a number in exponential notation.
trans-unit.target: `s`参数不能表示十六进制数或指数记数法的数字。

trans-unit.source: The *ws* element at the beginning or end of `s`, *sign* at the beginning of `s`, and the decimal point (*.*) symbol.
trans-unit.target: *Ws*元素的开头或末尾`s`，*登录*开头`s`，和小数点 (*。*) 符号。

trans-unit.source: The `s` parameter can also use exponential notation.
trans-unit.target: `s`参数还可以使用指数记数法。

trans-unit.source: The *ws*, *sign*, thousands separator (*,*), and decimal point (*.*) elements.
trans-unit.target: *Ws*，*登录*，千位分隔符 (*，*)，和小数点 (*。*) 元素。

trans-unit.source: All styles, except `s` cannot represent a hexadecimal number.
trans-unit.target: 所有样式，除`s`无法表示十六进制数字。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Globalization.NumberStyles.AllowHexSpecifier?displayProperty=nameWithType> flag is used, `s` must be a hexadecimal value without a prefix.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Globalization.NumberStyles.AllowHexSpecifier?displayProperty=nameWithType>使用标志，`s`必须是不带前缀的十六进制值。

trans-unit.source: For example, "C9AF3" parses successfully, but "0xC9AF3" does not.
trans-unit.target: 例如，"C9AF3"分析成功，但是"0xC9AF3"却没有。

trans-unit.source: The only other flags that can be present in `style` are <xref:System.Globalization.NumberStyles.AllowLeadingWhite?displayProperty=nameWithType> and <xref:System.Globalization.NumberStyles.AllowTrailingWhite?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 仅其他标志可出现在`style`是<xref:System.Globalization.NumberStyles.AllowLeadingWhite?displayProperty=nameWithType>和<xref:System.Globalization.NumberStyles.AllowTrailingWhite?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: (The <xref:System.Globalization.NumberStyles> enumeration has a composite style, <xref:System.Globalization.NumberStyles.HexNumber?displayProperty=nameWithType>, that includes both white space flags.)
trans-unit.target: (<xref:System.Globalization.NumberStyles>枚举具有复合样式， <xref:System.Globalization.NumberStyles.HexNumber?displayProperty=nameWithType>，其中包含两个空白标志。)

trans-unit.source: The `provider` parameter is an <xref:System.IFormatProvider> implementation, such as a <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> object or a <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo> object, whose <xref:System.IFormatProvider.GetFormat%2A> method returns a <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo> object.
trans-unit.target: `provider`参数是<xref:System.IFormatProvider>实现，如<xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>对象或<xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo>对象，其<xref:System.IFormatProvider.GetFormat%2A>方法返回<xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo>对象。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo> object provides culture-specific information about the format of `s`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo>对象提供的格式的区域性特定信息`s`。

trans-unit.source: If `provider` is `null`, the <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo> object for the current culture is used.
trans-unit.target: 如果`provider`是`null`、<xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo>对象使用当前区域性的。

trans-unit.source: The following example calls the <xref:System.Int32.TryParse%28System.String%2CSystem.Globalization.NumberStyles%2CSystem.IFormatProvider%2CSystem.Int32%40%29?displayProperty=nameWithType> method with a number of different string and <xref:System.Globalization.NumberStyles> values.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例调用<xref:System.Int32.TryParse%28System.String%2CSystem.Globalization.NumberStyles%2CSystem.IFormatProvider%2CSystem.Int32%40%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>与大量的不同的字符串的方法和<xref:System.Globalization.NumberStyles>值。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="style" /> is not a <see cref="T:System.Globalization.NumberStyles" /> value.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="style" /> 不是 <see cref="T:System.Globalization.NumberStyles" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="style" /> is not a combination of <see cref="F:System.Globalization.NumberStyles.AllowHexSpecifier" /> and <see cref="F:System.Globalization.NumberStyles.HexNumber" /> values.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="style" /> 不是 <see cref="F:System.Globalization.NumberStyles.AllowHexSpecifier" /> 和 <see cref="F:System.Globalization.NumberStyles.HexNumber" /> 值的组合。
